title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: From crypto-artist 1Dq comes one of their original paintings:"The Wailing of Crypto Winter"2019, Acrylics on Canvas, 60x40cmOriginal thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5156947Painting has been professionally framed and is ready to hangSTARTING BID: 0.0250BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 11th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
